headline: Molson Coors layoffs to include Canadian workers, but job cuts 'not driven by tariffs'
summary: The beer company plans to eliminate approximately 400 salaried positions across the Americas by the end of December

raw.headline: Molson Coors layoffs to include Canadian workers, but job cuts 'not driven by tariffs'
raw.summary: The beer company plans to eliminate approximately 400 salaried positions across the Americas by the end of December

headline: Molson Coors jobs to go as new CEO eyes “bolder decisions”
summary: The brewer said it expects to eliminate roughly 400 roles across the Americas business by the end of the year.

raw.headline: Molson Coors jobs to go as new CEO eyes “bolder decisions”
raw.summary: The brewer said it expects to eliminate roughly 400 roles across the Americas business by the end of the year.

headline: Is Molson Coors a Hidden Opportunity After Recent Alternative Beverage Investments and Price Drop?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Molson Coors Beverage is a bit like standing at a crossroads with a cold beverage in hand. It can be tempting to stick with what you know, but there is always curiosity about what might be just around the corner. After sliding nearly 19% year-to-date and dipping 14% over the past year, the stock’s recent moves have left many investors scratching their heads. Yet, if you zoom out, there is a very different picture: over the past five years, Molson Coors is up...
